channel.title: ide/editor on lunarwhite
channel.description: Recent content in ide/editor on lunarwhite

item.title: Eclipse IED settings for Java
item.description: 1 全局配置 代码自动补全 Window -> Perferences -> Java -> Editor -> Content Assist 在Auto Activation 段中设置 Auto activation triggers for Java .

item.title: VSCode
item.description: 拥抱开源，visual studio code简直就是开发利器、宇宙第一editor，尤其是众多开源的extension，让vscode始终充满活力。本文记录了不同语言下vscode的基本配置和全局快捷键，希望能最大效度利用好此工具，happy hacking，happy coding 1 全局配置 登录账号同步 删除自带theme 2 添加到右键菜单 Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00 [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Classes\*\shell\Open with &Code] @="Open with Code" "Icon"="C:\\Users\\mewin\\scoop\\apps\\vscode\\current\\Code.
